name: Robo Jungle Rush
description:
Rush into a vibrant jungle filled with mighty robots. Suit up and ride awesome vehicles! Win tons of coins and share videos of your victories with friends.

"Robo Jungle Rush is an enjoyable running adventure game that will keep you going with trophies, missions, mini-games, bosses, and character upgrades." -- AppReviewCentral.net

What our players are saying:
“The obstacles and power-ups are awesome!”
“Beautiful world scenarios and really good music!”
“I could play this game all day!”

Fancy dress your character as you jump, tilt, swipe and rush your way through an astonishing jungle with changing environments. Get coins, avoid obstacles, and take on dastardly robots using exciting power-ups and enthralling vehicles!

Collect unique trophies while completing engaging missions, and win additional bonuses in a casino-like mini-game to boost your score and aid your game!
Share video-replays of your victories to social media or email and check the leaderboards to keep track of your friends and decide who is best once and for all!

Key Features:

+ Fast-paced, engaging gameplay for both newcomers and experienced players.

+ Exciting power-ups and boost items give you an edge in your adventure.

+ Hop into incredible vehicles and master their own challenges.

+ Play a casino style mini-game for additional boosts and prizes.

+ A wide range of costumes available for your character. Ever wanted to see a gangster or a wrestler run in a jungle? Now you can!

+ Collect unique trophies and fill the jungle cabinet!

+ Tons of missions!

+ Full Social integration with Facebook, Twitter and Gamecenter. Compete with your friends through local leaderboards, and then take on the rest of the world!

+ Share your best moments with the video-replay system. Upload your best moments to facebook, twitter, youtube, or via email.

+ Coming soon: More worlds and playable characters!


Please note that the video-replay feature is currently not available on iPhone3gs, iPod Touch 3rd gen, iPod Touch 4th gen, and iPhone 4. We are working on getting these devices supported as well!
developers: Fraktalia Studios, S. de R.L. de C.V.
publishers: Fraktalia Studios, S. de R.L. de C.V.
